title: It Boosts Morale!
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]


[[=]]

Following incident [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6622 6622-C], Dr. Harry Blank is no longer permitted to take site 43 staff to feed instances of SCP-6622-A in the name of “boosting morale”. 

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Incident statement, Dr. William Wallace Wettle**: It took two fuckin’ hours to pry all those things off of me! TWO HOURS! How the hell do they even do that? 

[[/div]]

[[image https://i.imgur.com/dz1CO9t.jpeg]]

[[/=]]
author: Rosyfox2002
